name: creatirebreeding
description: A 3D creature breeding and evolution game with procedurally generated creatures

scripts.android:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync android
scripts.android:run: npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap run android

scripts.android:build:release: npm run build && npx cap sync android && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
